name: Ley Line Disorder: Mechanics of Penetration
description: You will deal +2 DMG to opposing characters not defended by Shield(s).

descriptionreplaced: You will deal <color=#FFFFFFFF>+2 DMG</color> to opposing characters not defended by {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color>(s).
